thread.title: Teen stumbles across her doppelganger in shopping centre - then discovers she's not her only lookalike
thread.title_full: Teen stumbles across her doppelganger in shopping centre - then discovers she's not her only lookalike

author: Nicola Oakley
title: Teen stumbles across her doppelganger in shopping centre - then discovers she's not her only lookalike
text:
The 17-year-old (not pictured) was in a shopping mall when she made the discovery (Photo: Getty) Share Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Ever spotted someone who looks exactly like you? 
It's not something which happens very often, so when a person does spot their doppelganger you can forgive them for getting a bit excited. 
One teenager was stunned to discover another girl who looked exactly like her in a shopping mall back in September. 
The 17-year-old had her photograph taken with the lookalike and shared it on Twitter, saying: "I found my literal doppelg√§nger just now wtf" 
The tweet quickly went viral, gaining over 22,000 retweets and 37,000 'likes'. 
But in the last week people have started sending her photographs of other women she also looks like. 
And there are quite a few of them. 
Maybe she's just got one of those faces? 
This is getting ridiculous now. 
Have you ever met your doppelganger? Share your photos using the form below or e-mail yourmirror@mirror.co.uk. 
One person even made a little collage of all the lookalikes being posted. 
And another suggested they should all join a cult. 
People said it was all getting too much... 
Have you ever met your doppelganger? We'd love to see your pictures. Share them using the form below or e-mail yourmirror@mirror.co.uk. Like us on Facebook
